title: Prawn soup with coconut milk
ingredients: ['butter for frying', '1 large onion, minced', '2 celery stalks', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '250ml fish stock', '1 tin (350g) coconut milk', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '4 tablespoons flour', '250ml milk', '500g prawns, peeled and cleaned', '1 teaspoon lime zest', 'salt and pepper to taste']
